patthana17.8:1.1_0: Akusalaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko
patthana17.8:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.8:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko
patthana17.8:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.8:3.1_0: Akusalaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanevadassanena
patthana17.8:3.1_1: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.8:4.1_0: Abyākataṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato nanevadassanena
patthana17.8:4.1_1: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
